EmailTemplate.description: When an employee gets a ‘Performance’ based recognition
EmailTemplate.name: Performance Recognition Email template for Resource
EmailTemplate.subject: RnR: Recognition for Outstanding Performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Resource__c},
We hope this message finds you well. We commend your exceptional performance recently. Your dedication, attention to detail, and hard work have significantly contributed to the success of our team.
{!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Recognization_By__c} has nominated you for your outstanding performance as part of {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Project__c} project. Your commitment to excellence is truly commendable, and we look forward to seeing more of your accomplishments.
Congratulations on this well-deserved recognition!
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
